str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
From hupo and a derivative of eresso; an under-oarsman, i.e. subordinate.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
A coal-fire, a heap of burning coals. From anthrax; a bed of burning coals.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To warm; mid: I warm myself. From therme; to heat.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
